content: ## Email The best way of contacting me is usually by my personal email address. [barry@barryfrost.com](mailto:barry@barryfrost.com) ## iMessage If you need to get hold of me in a hurry then you can send an iMessage from iOS or a Mac. [barry@barryfrost.com](imessage:barry@barryfrost.com) ## Twitter I get notifications for all mentions on Twitter so feel free to send me a public tweet. [@barryf](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=%40barryf%20) ## Skype I'm rarely logged in to Skype, but if we've arranged to speak you can contact me using the following account. [barryf](skype:barryf)
name: Contact
